类型: Color: A - Pink Purple StripeSize: XX-Large
评论详情: While I had high hopes for this as a staple for my fall wardrobe, I found that it didn't quite meet my expectations.  First off, the fabric quality is really good. It feels lightweight and soft against the skin, which is perfect for layering in the cooler months. The material doesn’t seem cheap or flimsy, and I really like that. The sweatshirt has a nice, casual vibe that caught my eye, and I can see how it could be a cute addition to many outfits.  However, the fit is where this top fell short for me. I found it to be quite cropped—more so than I anticipated. For someone who usually prefers a more traditional length in sweatshirts, this one didn't sit comfortably at all. The boxy silhouette adds to the problem; while boxy can sometimes work in favor of a trendy look, in this case, it made me feel a bit like I was drowning in fabric, especially around the torso. The shape just didn’t flatter my figure as I had hoped.  While I think this top is cute and could absolutely work for those who enjoy the cropped style, it ultimately wasn’t for me. The fit felt a bit off, and I can't see myself reaching for it regularly. However, I wouldn't say the sweatshirt is a complete miss; it might work out better for someone who loves a boxy, cropped style and wants something casual yet stylish.

Love the quality of this sweater and the feel! It is soft and smooth and thick.  Perfect for a fall day. The price was great - and worth it with the quality of the material. It is a crop sweater, therefore I sized up and felt it wasn’t too short. I am wearing a large.  The color matches anything making it a versatile piece!

A contradiction in style for me: I generally avoid horizontal stripes and shy away from crop tops, but something drew me to the design and colors available in this pullover now with the seasons beginning to change.  The cut of the draped shoulders into the timeless batwing makes it roomy on top. I particularly like the pleat on the back = more room to give hugs. But then the sweater tapers to the waist, giving form and a look of style. That’s why I’m surprised I like the crop top; it gives the pullover class.  I wouldn’t necessarily wear it for working out or playing ball (observing, yes, playing, no), but going to the office, store or casually getting together with friends, its ideal. It’s much lighter and more comfortable than I expected, given that it’s 100% polyester. Wearing it in late summer as a shawl to start, then as a sweater as the air cools should be great. As the colder temperatures roll around, it’ll be handy as an attractive layer for the season. My one complaint is the stripes aren’t a perfect match on the sides and inner arm. On mine, they were slightly askew. I don’t think anyone would notice, but I did.  In all, I think it’s a fashionable addition to my wardrobe making me a happy contradiction.

评论概述: It is more of an outfit piece than sports wear.

Who doesn’t love a soft comfy pullover top. I chose white as I wanted to wear with jeans and love the color white casually paired with a cool pair of jeans. I ordered my regular size small. As the size chart indicated it would be running a bit larger based on my normal small measurements. It’s the perfect fit. For reference, I’m approx 122lbs, 34DD, 27”W, 36”H  The fabric is a medium weight. Which I actually prefer for the comfort factor. This isn’t one of those super thick, bulky and hot sweatshirts. Again, my preference. I found the quality to be as expected and overall very happy. Washes up well and dried on low heat.

评论概述: A stylish silhouette with a soft, comfortable feel.
类型: Color: A - Pink Purple StripeSize: Large
评论详情: The WIHOLL Women's Long Sleeve Crop Tops are the perfect blend of style and comfort, designed to elevate your fall wardrobe in 2024. Featuring a classic crewneck design, these pullover shirts are crafted from lightweight materials that ensure you stay cozy without feeling weighed down. The chic crop style adds a trendy touch, making it easy to pair with high-waisted jeans or skirts for a fashionable look. Whether you're heading out for a casual day with friends or enjoying a cozy night in, these sweatshirts are versatile enough to suit any occasion.  Embrace the beauty of autumn with the WIHOLL Women's Long Sleeve Crop Tops, which combine a stylish silhouette with a soft, comfortable feel.

So, I like the look of this top, but it's not what I expected. I assumed it was going to be a full-on sweatshirt, but it's far too thin for that fabric wise. It's more of a long sleeve crewneck shirt than what I consider a sweatshirt. I'm well aware that not all sweatshirts are made of thick cotton, but this one is silkier than I associate sweatshirt fabric with. Also, it fits shorter than I assumed it would, too. However, as a shirt it's decent looking. I do like that it's lightweight, but again I thought I was getting more of a sweatshirt-y sweatshirt. Overall, the look is fine, but the material wasn't quite what I thought it was going to be.
